column2: "Yes, yes, that's it. Your Mag is really happy now, see? Isn't that cute? Aww!"
"Oops, I guess I got a little carried away there. Sorry. Anyway, just keep feeding it like that and your Mag will do just fine."
"And make sure to keep in mind how you want your Mag to develop until you have the exact Mag that you want."
"Take good care of your little cutie, okay? I'll see you later!"

"As you give items to your Mag and its level increases, it will learn new Actions.
There are two types of Mag Action.

・Auto Actions
These Mag Actions activate automatically.

・Trigger Actions
These Mag Actions activate in response to player actions.

Mag Actions cost Energy to activate. You can recover your Mag's Energy by giving it an item with Give Items."

"You can customize a Mag's abilities, as well as it's appearance, with the Use Device option. To do this, you will need special consumable items called Mag Devices.

You can purchase Mag Devices from the second floor of the Shop Area. They are available at the Photon Drop Exchange Shop and the Excube Exchange Shop.

Use Mag Devices to make your Mag your own."
